item.title: Analyzing Inpatient Data From the Hospital Charge Data Set
item.description: Letâ€™s examine the Hospital Charge Dataset from data.gov I wanted to analyse this dataset because I wanted to know charges varies with providers. Let me give you small snapshot of the dataset DRG Definition Provider Id Provider Name Provider Street Address Provider City Provider State Provider Zip Code Hospital Referral Region Descri 039 -EXTRACRANIAL PROCEDURES W/O CC OR MCC 10001 SOUTHEAST ALABAMA MEDICAL CENTER 1108 ROSS CLARK CIR DOTHAN AL 36301 AL - Dothan Total Discharges Average Covered Charges Average Total Payments Average Medicare Payments The dataset has the following columns:
